channel.title: SFoL11 UltimatePick - Game Over! (:IciHeadBanging:)
channel.description:
# Welcome one and all to SFoL11: ULTIMATEPICK ### Rules https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515 ### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it The lengths of the day and night will be decided. ### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Trials are in play. Once someone reaches majority, a trial will begin. Normal trial rules for FoL apply here. ### Journals Journals are in this game. Normal FoL rules apply here. # Special Mechanics (Very Important!) This game's signups will not end until nobody has joined for 48 hours or most already signed up players say: **/End Signups**. After that, all should PM me answers to the below questionaire:
Questionaire Please give me a name of a class that you'd like to see in this game: __________________ Do you want the class names to be given to the person who made it or someone random? -The person who made it -Someone random Do you want this game to be Bastard or not? -Yes -No Do you want this game to be a F A B U L O U S M U L T I B A L L? -Y E S -N O Should the informed minority(s) have a factional kill or a dedicated killer? -Factional Kill -Dedicated Killer Should the informed minority(s) have a conversion ability or not? -Yes -No What do you want the Informed Minority(s) to be called? 1st Choice: ___________ 2nd Choice: ____________ How many post restrictions do you want this game to have? ____________ Please give me a special mechanic you'd like to see in the game. ____________ How long should the days be? ____________ Should trials be in the game? -Yes -No Should journals be in the game? -Yes -No Should there be a King in the game? -Yes-No If there is a King, do you want them to have standard abilties or modified? -Standard -Modified
The answers to this questionairre will determine the setup of the game. ### Sample Rolecard > # [color=steblue]**Exampler**[/color] > > You are an [color=steblue]**Exampler,**[/color] a [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon OP Example.**[/color] > > You are a very nice rolecard formatting guide that will show everyone the rough shape of rolecards and what you can expect to see on them! > > - **Example Rolecard:** You appear in the OP as an example rolecard, and will show everyone what rolecards look like! > - **Exampler's Votes** You may vote during the day. > ---------- > **You win if you eliminate all threats to the Blue Dragon.** ### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want. These signups will end either when nobody has joined for 48 hours or the majority of already signed up players say /End Signups **Players:** 1. **Orangeandblack5** 2. **Hippolytus** 3. **JammySplodge** - King 4. **Simon** - DEAD 5. **PokemonKidRyan** 6. **NuclearBurrito** 7. **Polikshadowbliss** 8. **Methnor** - DEAD 9. **Wolfy** 10. **Eevee** - DEAD 11. **Braxien** 12. **Unknown** 13. **Rogue** 14. **Insanity** 15. **NozBugz** - DEAD 16. **Strangle** - DEAD **Bold = Confirmed** **Graveyard:** 0. Icibalus - **[color=grey]Compulsive Memeclaimer, Neutral N0 Suicidal Moderator[/color]** 10. Eeevee - **[color=steblue]The Flying Pumkin That Shoots Laser Beams Out Of It's Ass ,Blue Dragon Neighbour Triggered Role[/color]** 4. Simon - [color=steblue]**Wandering Spirit, Blue Dragon Restless Spirit**[/color] 8. Methnor - [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Modified Compulsive Fruit Vendor**[/color] 16. Strangle - [color=#FF40FF]**Crow Murderer, Magical Girl Non-Consecutive 1-shot Active Ninja Godfather Factional Killer**[/color] **Timeline** [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol11-ultimatepick-night-one-definitely-nothing-suspicious-happening-tonight/3622/333?u=icibalus]Day Two Begins/Night One Ends[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol11-ultimatepick-night-three-okay-then/3622/1026?u=icibalus]Day Three Begins/ Night Two Ends[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol11-ultimatepick-night-three-okay-then/3622/1585?u=icibalus]Day Four Begins/Night Three Edns.[/url]

item.title: SFoL11 UltimatePick - Game Over! (:IciHeadBanging:)
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Pug was originally

NuclearBurrito

Town Social
“Well it’s still a problem we can talk about so we may as well talk about it.” ~ NuclearBurrito
Multiball? (Day) - Learn exactly how many non-mafia evils are alive. - 1 use.
Neighborhood Madness (Night) - Target 2 players. For the rest of the game, these two players will have a private night and day chat to speak freely in. If you would add someone to a second neighborhood, instead both neighborhoods they are in will be combined into one big neighborhood. You may target yourself with this.

Turned into

PuppetMaster

Neutral Evil
It’s like a Burrito, except evil. (Passive) - You are immune to death, roleblocking and bleeding. When you die, flip this card and your previous rolecard.
Burrito Bombs (Night) - Place a burrito bomb on a player. If anyone visits that player, the burrito will trigger. Once triggered, It will alert the town a burrito bomb has been lit. Unless you are lynched, It will explode in 2 nights killing everyone except you. This bypasses all forms of immunity, healing and prevention.
Your goal is to survive to see everyone else lose.

Read full topic
